resources.string: Click back again to close the app
"You'll be able to use this ticket until %s."
"Then show the ticket to the scanner as you get on the bus. You'll be able to use this ticket from %s to %s."
"Then show it to the driver as you get on the bus. You'll be able to use this ticket from %s to %s%s."
If you no longer wish to use your Stagecoach account you can request an account closure on our website.
You cannot activate this ticket unless you are online. You can check your online status by going to your phone settings.
You already have an alert set
To see bus times please enable Location access in Settings.
Get off at the next stop
Allow location access to see nearby buses and stops
With access to your location we can help you reach your destinations faster
We are unable to determine your current location - please enable Location Services in Settings, or zoom into the map to see bus stops and services.
Currently we do not support AMEX cards. Please use a valid Visa or Mastercard to continue with this purchase.
"Any tickets or favourites linked to your account won't be accessible"
"We'd love to know if you like the app and how can make it better for you. Please can you help us with your feedback?"
How do you like the app?
Are you sure you want to delete payment method?
Are you sure you want to delete this address?
"Are you sure you want to leave this screen?"
Are you sure you want to log out?
There was an error with your basket, please add your tickets and try again.
There was an error with your basket, please click banner to retry.
We are unable to display any tickets while you are offline
You are not currently connected to the internet
"Sorry we can't access your account, please try again later"
Sorry there was a problem registering your account, please try again later
You entered an incorrect email or password
Sorry, this account has been disabled. Please contact us for more information.

"Sorry, you can't buy any more of those tickets in this transaction. This is for security purposes. If you need to buy more of these tickets, please go to your basket, checkout and start a new transaction."
"Sorry, can't add ticket to basket. Please try once again"

"You have a ticket already activated for travel, do you wish to activate another ticket?
"
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.

"You are about to send your ticket and a confirmatory email to:
%1$s "

"The confirmatory email will contain your name to identify you as the sender to the recipient. Please check the above email address is correct and then select 'Confirm and send' if you are happy to proceed:"
There was a connection error, please try again
Sorry there is a connection problem, please try again.
You need an internet connection to activate this ticket.
Please complete the App Contact Form with details of your issue.

"Social distancing measures on our buses mean there are fewer seats available.
We're adding more services especially at busy times, and to help you decide the best time to travel we're introducing a new busy bus indicator in our live map view to show which buses are likely to be most or least busy based on how many people usually travel on that service."

"Thank you for your interest in being a corporate ticket user, however the corporate account you are trying to access is not valid.
Please contact your company for further information on how to become a Stagecoach Bus corporate customer and to obtain a valid link.
We look forward to seeing you in the near future."

"Thank you for being a Corporate Travel user, however your corporate account has now expired.
%s
Your account will be switched to a standard Stagecoach Bus Account. You will no longer be able to purchase new corporate tickets but will still have full access to tickets already purchased.
You will also be able to access our standard ticket offering."

"Thank you for your interest in being a corporate ticket user, however the corporate link you have used has expired.
%s
Please contact your company if you require further information on how to become a Stagecoach Bus corporate customer.
We look forward to seeing you in the near future."
Corporate Travel Partner scheme tickets are not currently available in this area

"Once you have clicked the 'Continue with Corporate Travel' button below and completed the sign up/log in process, your account will then be a Corporate Travel account.
You will be able to:"
" • Use our interactive map to track your service • Search for and purchase Corporate Travel tickets • Search for locations, services and stops"
If you are an existing Stagecoach Bus account holder, you may use this account as your Corporate Travel account or you may wish to create a new one.
"Sorry, something went wrong when processing your request. Please try again."
Please connect to the internet and try again
Sorry, you can’t use the ticket on this device right now

"Your ticket is now ready to use on this device.
Simply locate the ticket under ‘Tickets To Use’ and tap ‘Resume Activation’."
"Sorry you can't move your ticket to this device as you've already reached a limit"
"You can only move two active tickets within a 90 day period. The same ticket can't be moved more than once."
Discount codes can be applied at checkout
Do you want to delete this alert?
Do you want to save your changes?
Tickets downloaded and ready to use
You can use your fingerprint ID instead of entering your password at checkout.
Enter the email address you would like to transfer to
Enter your email so we can send you a link to reset it
Please enter your Stagecoach account password
"Can't connect to service or server down"
Please install a web browser application to continue.
Your dick is simply too big to use this app.
Please enable location in system settings
Please note the results of your journey plan may be different on our website. Please check the new results at the top of the page before choosing your ticket.
Add your favourites by tapping the star icon next to journeys, services or stops within the Live map or Plan a journey screens.
Quick access to your saved favourites
Favourite cannot be updated right now.
We appreciate your feedback - would you like to rate us?
File sizes are large - download over WiFi to avoid eating into your mobile data
Find a bus or bus stop
Find bus stops in another area
Find mobile tickets in your area
Set up fingerprint scanning in Settings?

"Service locations and expected times displayed use the best information available at that time
Stagecoach makes every effort to ensure the information presented is as accurate as possible"
Once you’ve confirmed you wish to move a ticket it’ll be ready for use straight away.
"Moving a multi-trip ticket will deactivate all tickets in the bundle and they'll need to be reactivated."
"You can only move two active tickets within a 90 day period. The same ticket can't be moved more than once."
Your ticket is now ready to use on this device.
Simply locate the ticket under ‘Tickets To Use’ and tap ‘Resume Activation’.
Please enter the correct details for a valid card
"Give it another try in the My tickets area"
Buy mobile tickets ready for your journey >
Mobile tickets allow you to instantly purchase and use tickets on your device without printing or collecting.
Using mobile tickets in 5 easy steps – Faster Onboarding

"Some tickets can be gifted to another Stagecoach Bus account holder. These tickets will be clearly marked with the following:
"Send to another person"
If you wish to gift your ticket to another person, select this link on the ticket and follow the instructions."
Find the ticket you need for your journey and purchase using your device – your mobile tickets will be downloaded onto your device.
Step 1: Buy your tickets for travel

"Tap 'Terms & conditions' before activating your ticket to check when your ticket is valid for travel. There are restrictions on some tickets.
Mobile tickets can normally be used at any time within 3 months of purchase but please see individual ticket terms and conditions for expiry details."

"Activate your ticket just as you get on the bus.
Some mobile tickets require an internet connection to activate. These tickets will be clearly marked with the text ""'Activate online'"".
If the ticket has the text ""'Activate'" then it can be activated when connected to the internet or when you are offline (only for up to 72 hours when offline).
Step 3: Activate your ticket when getting on the bus

"Some Stagecoach buses now have ticket scanners installed next to the ticket machine. You can use the scanner to check your ticket instead of presenting it to the driver. The scanner will show green lights if your ticket has been accepted. If the scanner shows red lights or does not recognise your ticket, please present your ticket to the driver.
If the bus does not have a scanner installed, please show your ticket to the driver."
Step 4: Present your ticket when you get on a bus
Important note: If you lose your device, you may lose tickets that you have not activated. All activated and expired tickets will be lost. If you delete your app, you may lose tickets.
Step 5: Keep your mobile tickets safe
I agree to the terms of use
i.e. brand name, size, items inside
The time on your device is incorrect. This may invalidate your ticket when it is scanned. Please go to your setting and ensure that your current date/time settings are correct.
Please install the application which can read .pdf files
"We’ve noticed you have been offline for over %s. To use your Mobile QR Tickets currently held on your account you need to be online - please check your internet connection."
Is this your correct email address?
There was a problem loading the TFL planner, please try again later.
The last three digits on the back of your card
Bus last known status updated at: %s
Username not found or password incorrect
Please log in to see your purchased tickets
Please login to see your active tickets
Please log in or create a Stagecoach account to buy tickets, save your favourites and view your account details.
Please log in or create a Stagecoach account to buy tickets, save your favourites and view your account details.
"Please log in to your Stagecoach account or create an account to use all the great features of our App. Save your favourite journeys and bus stops, find buses near you and much more…"
Take a look at our FAQS
Ticket can not be activated. Please call Customer Service
Please note only the full price of the ticket is displayed
This mobile ticket is no longer available to purchase. Sorry! Please view other mobile tickets in your area.
Mobile tickets available in this area
Tap to switch to selecting a day
Tap to switch to selecting a year
The email address must belong to a Stagecoach Bus account holder
There has been a network error. Please retry. If the problem persists, please call customer services.
There is an important new version of the Stagecoach bus app. Please visit the app store to update.
"Please log in to see your active tickets or access 'My Tickets' to see any tickets purchased."
"Please access 'My Tickets' to see any tickets purchased."
No bus stops available within this view - please enter a bus service number or location or try plan a journey.
There are no buses matching this route number at the moment
no content area code for this location in dynamic settings
Information cannot be displayed while you are offline. Please connect to the internet.
This ticket is no longer owned by you. It will now be removed from this device. If you have any queries, please contact customer services.
No mobile tickets in this area
No mobile tickets available in this area, watch this space!
no opcocode for area code cannot download opcode!
"Sorry, we can't find any results matching '%s' Search tips: please check your spelling or try a town, street or postcode"
"Sorry we can't find any routes for that journey, try changing your search terms"
"Sorry - we are unable to provide information for this stop at this time - please try again."

"Sorry, Stagecoach services are not currently available for the stop you have selected.
Another operator may provide services from this stop.
Please select another stop to see our services."

"This type of ticket:
1. can be purchased and used on this device only "
"2. can be activated without an internet connection for upto 72 hours after purchase. After 72 hours you will need to reconnect to the internet to activate further tickets "
"3. can be used any time within 3 months "

"4. cannot be cancelled, refunded, gifted or downloaded to another device.
If you delete this app, you may lose your tickets"
"It appears that Stagecoach doesn't operate in the location you are set to. To submit feedback, please select a different location using the menu on the home screen or email app@stagecoachbus.com"
Any Stagecoach ticket that does not indicate that it must be activated online can be activated off-line:
These ticket(s) have been refunded so they are no longer available to download
Sorry your order did not go through this time

"We're sorry that you've experienced issues downloading your ticket(s). This may have been caused by a connectivity problem.
Please try downloading your ticket(s) again. If this still doesn't work, please complete the App Contact Form with details of your issue by selecting 'Contact us'.
Need help with another issue?"
Mobile tickets are available from the Oxford tube app.

"1. Mobile tickets bought on this phone can only be used on this phone. Tickets cannot be cancelled, refunded or transferred.
2. Use your mobile tickets at any time within 3 months.
3. If you delete this app, you will lose any active mobile tickets!
4. You can activate as many tickets as you like without an internet connection for 72 hours. After 72 hours you will need to reconnect in order to activate further tickets."
Your ticket could not be downloaded at this time
Your payment was successful but your tickets could not be downloaded

"1. The app needs access to your location only when the app is in use to provide nearby bus information and to allow journey planning from your current location.
2. The app needs access to your storage to store your purchased mobile tickets on your device.
3. The app needs access to your telephone to identify your device. The app does not use your telephone number in any way or make any calls."
The Stagecoach Bus App needs the following permissions
To make sure you have the most up to date service and timetable information for your local area, please check Service updates or see our Coronavirus page
Please use your fingerprint to continue securely.
"Please check your email and follow the instructions we've sent."
Please connect to the internet to activate your tickets
Please connect to the internet soon to be sure you can activate another ticket
Please connect to the internet to add favourites
Please connect to the internet to remove favourites
Please connect to the internet and try again.
"We're afraid your order did not go through, please contact your bank."
Please mention your departure time, bus route number, origin and destination.
Tell us which location you would like to contact us about
Sorry someone has already registered with this email, please try a different one
The postcode provided is invalid, please check and try again
We care about protecting your privacy. View our Privacy Policy for details of how we collect and use your information.

"This type of ticket:
1. can be purchased and used on this device "
"2. can be downloaded to another device so long as the ticket has not been activated "
"3. can, where stated on the ticket, be activated on a different device (this will deactivate it on the original device) and can only be done once in a 90 day period "

"4. can, where stated on the ticket, be gifted to another person with an existing Stagecoach Bus account so long as the ticket has not been activated. The recipient must sign into the Stagecoach Bus app to use the gifted ticket
5. can be cancelled in line with our standard Terms and Conditions
To ensure your active ticket is valid when boarding the service, you must make sure you have connected to the internet within this app at least once in the previous 8 hours.
If you delete this app, you may lose your tickets
For expiry details please see individual ticket Terms and Conditions
"
"Purchasers must identify the gift recipient's email address."
Tickets received as a gift can only be viewed by logging into the Stagecoach Bus mobile App.
Purchasers must be online when transferring a gift ticket.
Gift tickets can only be transferred to another Stagecoach Bus account holder.
Gift tickets are transferable once by the purchaser.
"Specified tickets, indicated by 'Send ticket to another person 🎁' can be gifted to another person."
"Tickets must be activated while you're connected to your mobile or WiFi network."
You could qualify for a discount
I understand that I am creating a Stagecoach account, and I agree to the terms of use

"I would like to receive special offers and promotions, travel tips and latest news from Stagecoach by email, post and other electronic means. If you change your mind you can opt out at any time. We care about protecting your privacy. View our "Privacy Policy for details of how we collect and use your information.
Your password needs 8 or more characters, must include at least 1 number, 1 uppercase and 1 lowercase letter
Password. Your password needs 8 or more characters, must include at least 1 number, 1 uppercase and 1 lowercase letter
"We won't share your details with anyone outside of Stagecoach"
Bus number changes to %1$s, please remain on the bus at %2$s

"With FlexiRider and other MultiTrip tickets you buy a bundle of tickets at one price.
Each time you use a ticket from your bundle we'll update it, so you'll always know how many are left.
Remember to only activate one ticket at a time, when you need to use it."
Remove some %s to make space for more. On your home screen, select the three dots next to a favourite to remove it.
Unfortunately the ticket cannot be activated for unknown reasons. Would you like to retry?

You cannot send a ticket to another Stagecoach Bus account holder when your device is offline. You can check your online status by going to your phone settings.
"Your ticket has been removed from 'My tickets'. You have been sent an email confirmation. You can still view this ticket in your purchase history."

"Congratulations, you have gifted a ticket to %1$s.
The ticket has been removed from 'My tickets' on your account but can still be seen in your purchase history.
You and the recipient have been sent an email confirmation and the ticket is ready for activation and use."
Valid for %s from time of activation.
Travel time from %s until %s next day.
Travel time from %s until %s same day.
Valid for 7 days of travel from the date of activation
Valid for %d days of travel from the date of activation.
"Please try again 15 minutes before the ticket's start time (%s)."
Please turn off the alert before setting a new one
"Turn on your location settings in Stagecoach"
Plan a journey with Stagecoach now or in the future. Save your favourite journeys, services or stops for easy travel.

Buy and use tickets instantly and securely on your phone.

We need to know your location to do that

"We noticed you activated tickets while offline.
To keep your unused tickets secure, you can only activate tickets for 72 hours while offline.
After 72 hours you will need to reconnect to the internet to activate more tickets."
"We'll send you a message 1 stop before you need to get off"
"We'll send you a message 3 stops and 1 stop before you need to get off"
"Log in to buy tickets and add favourites"
You can now purchase and use tickets within the app, plan journeys and check bus times

"As schools re-start we are doing all we can to help pupils get there safely, including making some changes to our bus services and times.
We are adding extra dedicated school buses and to help show the services we’re introducing a new school bus indicator in our live map."
What would you like to contact us about?
Your Stagecoach Bus app has been updated.

From now on, when you activate any ticket showing the logo above, that ticket will be available to you across all of your mobile devices. Choose to move your active tickets between your devices and even reinstate your active tickets if you lose, damage or change your device
We have recently updated your Stagecoach bus app to include some great new features, including:
Log in to your Stagecoach Bus account to see them
Your Stagecoach mobile tickets and saved favourites are still valid and secure
New interactive map to track your service
Quicker, easier access to your mobile tickets
Easier searching for locations, services and stops
